short_summary: Technical Development and Support Services for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC).
full_summary:
# Technical Development and Support Services for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)

## Tender Details

* Tender Title: Technical Development and Support Services for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)
* Solicitation Number: 1000246592
* Publication Date: February 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Tender Status: Expired
* Reference Number: PW-23-01024699
* Amendment Number: 0

## Contract Overview

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking a qualified Service Provider to provide technical development and support services on an as-and-when required basis to support the Enterprise IT Infrastructure Services Directorate (EIIS) operational activities and projects.

The primary service role will be supporting the desktop environment and directory services, as well as the adoption of cloud services. The Contractor will provide technical development and support services, including reviewing and documenting existing information management technical architecture, developing a project plan, and providing maintenance and support services.

## Scope of Work

The Contractor's work will primarily, but not exclusively, be involved in the development and implementation of ISC's desktop environment and/or vendor-specific cloud environments. This includes:

* Reviewing and documenting existing information management technical architecture
* Providing a recommended information management technical architecture for the desktop environment
* Developing a project plan for the development, testing, and implementation of desktop images and/or cloud-based technologies/applications and configurations
* Providing distributed computing and workplace technology device (WTD) hardware and software support
* Providing maintenance and support services for existing systems
* Providing knowledge transfer to ISC personnel

## Contract Duration and Requirements

* Contract award to March 31, 2028
* Services required in the following TBIPS Resource Categories: Business Architect, Technical Architect, and Project Manager
* Contractor services will be provided on an as-and-when required basis, as outlined in authorized Task Authorization (TA) Forms issued by ISC.

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Bruno Paradis
* Email: [bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca) 
* Department: Indigenous Services Canada

## Additional Information

This tender notice is issued under the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB), and the Contractor must meet the requirements of this program to be eligible for consideration.
